DOC.brief_summary: To report safety and efficacy of intravitreal injection of bevacizumab in patients with cystoid macular edema secondary to cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Bevacizumab (Avastin) for Pseudophakic Macular Edema (PME)
DOC.criteria: Pseudophakic eyes with macular edema Other retinopathies
